resources.string: Welcome to the Jiayu App. This application will show your exact model with the nomenclature you will find on www.jiayu.es . Click on Downloads and Accessories to access to specific content for your Jiayu model.
Firefox is not installed. For a correct download from MEGA it is necessary, ¿Install now?
Once Mega runs, click Desktop Version on the bottom left side . Mega will then load on it´s Pc version and download will be successful.
, although on the device information Jiayu is not indicated as the manufacturer
This mobile phone is not Jiayu
An error has occurred. It´s not possible to detect your Jiayu model
You already have the latest version
